name: AstroShooter
description:
Hi, its my first game ive ever created, so its very exiting for me. 

Its a bit simple but ive made everything by myself so im proud of my work.

I will continue to work on it in the future and add more gameplay, graphics and sounds at the same time i improve my skills.

I hope you will enjoy to play. Please let me a comment or share me your own game, i will be very happy to try it.
